product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding All Rounder Stand Up Paddleboard - 8' 4"
long_description: Equally capable of handling surf as it is flatwater, this entry-level paddleboard provides a stable platform for kids and teenagers to develop their paddling skills and take them to the next level.
short_description: Equally capable of handling surf as it is flatwater, this entry-level paddleboard provides a stable platform for kids and teenagers to develop their paddling skills and take them to the next level.
